com.epam.testapp.util

Class CustomRequiredFieldChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.testapp.util.CustomRequiredFieldChecker

  • public class CustomRequiredFieldChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing custom validation methods. Methods check if current action is "save", and if it is true, delegate validation to org.apache.struts.validator.FieldChecks class.

    • Constructor Summary
